CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "Knowledge Base"), 'utility:knowledge_base', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "question_answer"), 'utility:questions_and_answers', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "Salesforce"), 'utility:salesforce1', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "Trailhead"), 'utility:trail', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "Video"), 'utility:video', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "File"), 'utility:file', IF(ISPICKVAL(Resource_Type__c , "podcast_webinar"), 'utility:broadcast', "")))))))
CustomField.label: Icon Name
